properties.Title: Where will Brussels take you?
properties.Desc: Vigilance is the price of liberty.

properties.Title: "It doesn't take an army! It takes a few good people."
properties.Desc: This was my former boss' motto and the exact definition of my team at Solvoyo. Being the COO of a high-tech start-up, Nilufer has always been a great mentor and source of inspiration for me. Not only she has always encouraged me to push my limits and grow in multiple domains, but also has put her trust in me and stood by me just like a true leader. Albeit, it's a bit ironic that I started my internship at NATO while trying to internalize the motto that argues ''it does not take an army!'' Maybe it is true after all, it takes thirty of them instead of one...
